tools.name: OpenAI GPT-3
tools.description: GPT-3 is an advanced natural language processing AI tool that can generate high-quality written content, including articles, emails, and social media posts.

tools.name: Google Dialogflow
tools.description: Dialogflow is a platform for building conversational agents, chatbots, and voice apps powered by AI.

tools.name: IBM Watson Studio
tools.description: Watson Studio is an integrated platform designed to make it easy to develop, train, and deploy AI models and applications.

tools.name: Canva
tools.description: Canva is an AI-powered graphic design tool that allows users to create professional-looking designs for social media, marketing, and more.

tools.name: Grammarly
tools.description: Grammarly is an AI-powered writing assistant that helps users check for grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors.

tools.name: Hootsuite
tools.description: Hootsuite is a social media management tool that allows users to schedule and manage posts across multiple social media platforms.

tools.name: Luminar AI
tools.description: Luminar AI is a photo editing tool that uses AI technology to help users enhance their photos and create stunning visual effects.

tools.name: Zapier
tools.description: Zapier is an automation tool that allows users to connect and automate workflows between different apps and services.

tools.name: TensorFlow
tools.description: TensorFlow is an open-source machine learning framework that allows users to develop and train AI models for a wide range of applications.
